page.title: 03GOING TO SCHOOL IN BERGHOLT
page.content: ON MONDAY I GET UP AT 7:OOAM GET DRESSED,WASHED AND EAT MY BREAKFAST.I THEN PUT MY COAT AND SHOES ON AND WALK TO SCHOOL.WHEN I GET IN SCHOOL I SIT DOWN AT MY DESK AND I START TO READ MY BOOK.IN A LITTLE WHILE AFTERWARDS WE START ON OUR MATHS FOR THE WEEK.AT 10:OOAM I GO AND GET CHANGED FOR MY SWIMMING LESSON WHILE THE REST OF THE CLASS GO INTO ASSEMBLY.AT 10:30 I GET OUT THE POOL WITH THE OTHER CHILDREN AND GET DRIED.THEN OUR BELL WILL GO FOR PLAYTIME AND WE EAT A SNACK OR SOMETHING.AFTER PLAY WE COME BACK IN AND DO SOME CREATIVE WRITING.AT 12:15PM WE HAVE OUR DINNER THEN HAVE ANOTHER PLAY.AT 1:30PM IT'S ROUNDERS OR P.E.AFTER, WE DO SOME SINGING OR REHEARSE A PLAY.AT 3:15PM WE PACK AWAY AND GO HOME. BY CLARE STEVENS.
